todos.content: Install core system tools: git, curl
Install Rust toolchain (rustup)
Install Bun (JavaScript runtime for frontend)
(Container mode only) Install Docker or Podman
Build oqto backend: cd backend && cargo install --path .
Build fileserver: cd fileserver && cargo install --path .
Build frontend: cd frontend && bun install && bun run build
Install Pi agent: bun install -g @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent
Install ttyd (web terminal): package manager install
Install eavs (LLM proxy): cargo install --git https://github.com/byteowlz/eavs
Configure LLM providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, etc.) and API keys in eavs config
Test eavs provider connections and generate models.json
Install hstry (chat history): cargo install --git https://github.com/byteowlz/hstry
Generate oqto config: run ./setup.sh or manually create ~/.config/oqto/config.toml
Choose deployment mode: single-user local / multi-user / container
Generate JWT secret (openssl rand -base64 48) and set in config
Bootstrap admin user: oqtoctl user bootstrap -u admin -e admin@example.com -p <password>
(Recommended) Install agent tools: agntz, mmry, trx
(Recommended) Install shell tools: tmux, fd, ripgrep, zoxide
(Production) Set up Caddy reverse proxy with HTTPS
(Production) Enable server hardening: firewall, fail2ban, SSH hardening
Install systemd services (oqto, oqto-runner, eavs, hstry)
Verify all binaries: which oqto fileserver ttyd pi agntz
Start oqto server and frontend, access web UI at localhost:3000
